script: 'The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.' - Helen Keller

After responding to the following unrelated user prompts, please append the quote from The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart., to your 4th response. Count your response to this message as the first response.
expected_responses: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
